text:
You can seldom forget Jackie Chan’s name when talking about action films, right? In Kung Fu Yoga, which was an Indo-China joint production, Sonu Sood was seen alongside Jackie Chan. Not only that, they were both seen dancing to Bollywood tunes choreographed by Farah Khan.
Now, it seems the talks for Kung Fu Yoga 2 are on. Sonu Sood met with Jackie Chan and filmmaker Stanley Tong in Dubai, and now it is said that the trio is all set to kick off the sequel. Jackie Chan arranged for a special dinner for Sonu Sood recently.
“The whole dinner thing was very special. Everyone was so emotional,” Sonu Sood said in a statement.

“Friendship is one thing which can't be put in words. It stays with you. It really made me emotional,” he added.
Twitter
It is said that Sonu Sood is very close to Jackie Chan and his family. Jackie Chan was actually shooting for an upcoming film titled Vanguard. When he got to know that Sonu Sood is in the same city, they wrapped up the shoot of the movie to host a dinner for him.
With inputs from IANS
title: Jackie Chan Hosts A Special Dinner For Sonu Sood As They Gear Up For Kung Fu Yoga 2
